nodes.text: The Yellow Ace was a ship piloted by Bo Keevil, who performed stunts and tricks while flying it. It was a complex ship to fly, and had wings that could shift into a variety of configurations. Keevil often crashed the ship.

In an earlier version of the script for the Star Wars Resistance episode "Dangerous Business", Jarek Yeager's crew worked on the Yellow Ace. Artwork showing the ship's interior engine sections was developed, but was changed to the Fireball instead in the episode's final script draft.
